name: Bugs make fine snacks
description:
*Please use the windows version if possible. Web version is prone to lag and errors*

Bugs make fine snacks is a hand-drawn endless runner game with watercolour illustrations and cool music. Help our little short-sighted owl to fly in the night forest and look for yummy bug snacks. Be careful - don't touch the thorns.

Created for Backtrace Game Jam #3

Controllers: up/down/left/right

Credits:

  • Art & Code: Ana Merzlaya
  • Music & Sfx: Alios
